mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members( mem_id, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_phone, entp_name, mem_profile, mem_level ) Values( #{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{entpName}, #{memProfile}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT mem_id, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_phone, entp_name, mem_profile, mem_level FROM members WHERE 1=1 AND MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_PW = #{memPw}
